Public transportation: If available, public transportation such as buses, trams, trains, or subways can be used to commute.
Carpooling: If multiple people are going to the same destination, carpooling can be a more efficient and cost-effective option.
Scooters and mopeds: Electric scooters and mopeds are smaller, fuel-efficient vehicles that can be easily parked and driven on roads.
Skateboards and rollerblades: For short distances, skateboards and rollerblades can be used as an eco-friendly and healthy alternative to cars.
Biking: While the question specifies that all bicycles have disappeared, if one has access to a bicycle or can purchase one, biking can be a great way to commute and exercise.
